panels.description: The number of nginx proxy 500 errors.

targets.query: ucp_access_label:"$env" AND access_log_req_host:"myapp-dashboard-$env.contino.io" AND service_name:"$env-infra_proxy" AND response:[500 TO 599]

panels.title: Proxy 5xx Error count

panels.description: Displays the total volume of requests vs the unsuccessful requests.

targets.query: ucp_access_label:"$env" AND access_log_req_host:"myapp-$env.contino.io" AND service_name:"$env-infra_proxy" AND response:[500 TO 599]

panels.title: Volume of requests vs failed requests

alert.name: Microservice Error Rate per Second alert

panels.description: This shows the current/average rate of 500 errors per microservices. This panels datasource comes metrics being scraped off microservices. Calculated as operations per second (ops).
panels.title: Microservice Error Rate per Second

panels.description: This shows the current/average response rate per second of microservices. Calculated as operations per second (ops).
panels.title: Microservice Response Rate

panels.description: Shows current/average rate of kafka messages in per second
panels.title: Kafka Messages In per Second by Cluster

panels.description: Shows average/vurrent request wait time in queue / milisecond
panels.title: Kafka Avg Request Wait Time in Request Queue (ms)

panels.description: Shows current/average kafka request time in miliseconds.
panels.title: Kafka Average Request Time (ms) by Cluster

panels.description: Shows the network request rate per second by Kafka hosts.
panels.title: Kafka Network Request Rate / sec by host

panels.description: Shows current clients connected by cassandra cluster

panels.description: Shows the top 5 failing Jenkins Jobs. The number displayed to the right specifies the quantity job failures over the selected time range.
